data.title: Manila Central University, Philippines: Fees, Admission, Eligibility
data.meta_description: MBBS Admission in Manila Central University, Philippines for Indian Students, Know more about Fees Structure, Admission Procedure, Intake, Duration, Eligibility, Document Required, Visa, Hostel - Eklavya Overseas
data.text:
Manila Central University

Manila Central University which is also known as Escuela de farmica del licedo de manila (1904-1915) is a private, non-secreterian, non-stock educational, institution, situated inEDSA, Caloocan City, Philippines. It was the first pharmacy school run by Filipinos that offers 4-year Bachelor of Science in nursing program in the Philippines. The university was founded in 1904 by Dr. Aljendro, M. Albert. Manila Central University is one of the former member universities of the university Athletic Association of the Philippines, from 1952-1962. Manila Central University roots are too old it sees many faces and its name or title is changes with time due to changes of their trustees, the University was established in 1903. The university is 114 years old higher education institution that has some selective admission policy based on entrance examinations. The Manila Central University is NMC recognized and degrees from this university are approved across the globe. It is also good in ranking and it speaks a lot about the quality of education provided by this. The environment of the campus is safe and calm. All the facilities are provided by the University to the students such as accommodation, internet, food and many more. Students from the different nations study together and respect each other.

Important Links

Intake

Benefits of Studying in the University

Manila Central University is continuously committed to its share in improving the lives of people. The standards of the university are constantly rising with improving facilities to enable its graduates to meet the challenges and opportunities in the Philippines and around the world.

The university-trained the students who dreamt of to study medicine. University constantly works towards to provide quality education to their student. The knowledge of the ideas that they plant in their students will provide them the skills and confidence they need to achieve.

The passing percentage of students keeps on increasing and in a short time, it will cross the hundreds.

The university infrastructure is with the best of laboratories and educational equipment. A good infrastructure is the most important element of learning environments making this university one of the most prestigious institutions for medical and other higher studies.

Accreditation of University

Manila Central University is one of the oldest roots of the country which provide quality education to the students in the field of medicine and nursing. The university allows foreign students also to study at their university. The university got so many accreditations by the Philippines government some of them are as below:

The university is officially accredited or recognized by the commission of Higher Education, Philippines. The university is a small coeducational higher education institution.

The university is acknowledged and endorsed by the National Medical Commission.

The university is also recognized by the WHO (World Health Organization).

Duration of MBBS in University

Manila Central University offers the 6 years of MBBS course in which students have to attend a one-year mandatory internship, in which they get the core knowledge of clinical topics. In the 1 year of internship schedule, they give the decent exposure to let the students test their knowledge on a real-time basis. The University also offers scholarship programs for national and International Students. There are two options for the internship at university. Practice in the university is not necessary.

MBBS Intake of the University

Manila Central University allows many foreign and native students with more than 50 courses in science and technology. The university has the best faculty members staff with professional and experienced educators who are experienced and specialists in their respective fields and give the best of their knowledge to the students. Our all teachers and professors are educated from the best universities. They provide the best of their knowledge and teach students to be great human beings.

Ranking of the University

Manila Central University occupies the top 10000 rankings in all around the world. University occupies 9714 ranks worldwide. If we talk about its country ranking it occupies the 77th rank in his country.

University Admission Deadlines

Everyuniversity sets some deadlines to apply for admission in their respective offered courses. Generally the admission begins in India in three-phase the first is filling application form then there is entrance examination and then the counselling. Very similar admission procedure is followed in Philippine’s Manila Central University. The application begins in the month of august and the entrance examination subject to certain condition is conducted in the month of October. However, the session of the MBBS course starts at the beginning of November or the last week of October.

Admission Process for the MBBS Course

Gather the required information related to MBBS course admission.

Fill the online admission application form with the correct and essential details.

Upload the scanned copies of the required academic and other documents.

Wait for the Welcome Letter from the university you have applied. Also, note that a university has the right to reject or accept your application.

The admission is purely on first cum first serve basis. Hence, every student should apply on time. Also, it is better to apply in more than one university to increase your chances of admission in the MBBS study program abroad.

Upon evaluation of your application, documents, and other details, a university or a college sends you the Offer Letter or Welcome Letter.

Once you receive the university Welcome or Offer Letter, you are supposed to pay the first year university tuition fee.

Post the fee payment, you are required to make application for the Visa without wasting your valuable time.

Your Visa application should be supported by the necessary documents.

Pay the Visa application fee and wait for the approval. It can take up to 30 days’ time.

Once you receive your Visa, you are ready to fly.

Get your air ticket booked and prepare yourself for the safe journey.

Medium of Teaching in the Manila Central University

The medium of teaching in Manila Central University is English, which is compatible both for the native and the international students.

Documents for MBBS Programme Admission

Academic documents of10th and 12thclass

Government approved Birth Certificate

Documents of your medical fitness test

Passport with a validity of at least 18 months.

Four clear passport size photographs

Letter of acceptance from the respective Medical University

Receipt of payment of the visa fee

University 1st-year tuition fee payment receipt

The Ministry of External Affairs (New Delhi) authorizations on all documents

Proof of legalization of all of your documents from Philippines Embassy

Hostel Facilities

The university allows the hostel facilities for both boys and girls separately with complete power backup. The Hostel will fulfil all your basic facilities with high security. Hostels are under strict security cover round the clock. The rooms are allotted on the sharing basis so students do not feel lonely and enjoy their hostel life too while MBBS Study in Philippines.

Availability of Indian Food

You can find all types of food in the college mess that you like to have. In the college canteen, you will get vegetarian and non-vegetarian food items. In the college mess, you will get tasty and healthy food with a pure hygienic maintained by the management. But in case if you are unavailable to find your food in college mess and canteen then there are many Indian restaurants available in Manila city where you can order your Indian cuisines at affordable price.

Indian Students in Manila Central University

Manila Central University is one of the oldest universities in the country that allows many Indian, foreign, and native students in their university. Manila Central University’s graduates are increasing day by day. It is giving more than 80% of excellent results in a bachelor of sciences or masters of Science degree. The university aims to develop their student’s well-rounded individuals who are more humane with adequate medical knowledge and skills. It also aims the university MBBS students to be imbued with desirable personality traits and a sense of public service. They also them to take part intelligently and actively in the community and national development of the nation they practice medicine after the successful completion of their study in medicine from Philippines.

List of Medical Schools in Philippines

AMA School of Medicine University of Perpetual Help Our Lady of Fatima Emilio Aguinaldo College Manila Central University Bicol Christian College of Medicine

About the City and Weather

Manila Central University is located in the heart of the Metro Manila Caloocan city. It is one of the first- class urbanized cities in Metro Manila. Caloocan city is having a population of about 1583978 people and is the fourth most populous city in the Philippines. If we talk about the city weather conditions then its weather is moderate in the whole year. The temperature increases or decreases one or two degrees more or low from the normal. There is some time in month or year when it rains in the city. You can enjoy the weather and beauty of the city which give a wonderful picturesque. Facilities in the campus are equipped with the modern amenities. It includes library, labs, airy classrooms, clean campus, good infrastructure, internet, 24x7 electric, and water supply for the medical students studying medicine in Philippinesfrom Manila Central University. Seeking admission to the MBBS Program is the dream for many Indian students in the extensively sought educational institution Manila Central University. But only a few students prove fortunate to seek confirmed seat to MBBS Course studies in Philippines. The support services by MBBS abroad consultants in Delhi are exceptional and are unbelievable.
